channel.title: Exp rates
channel.description: How do i change it? to make it faster to lvl up/

item.title: Exp rates
item.dc:creator: @Axed Axed
item.description:
@Axed wrote:

Search 1200 and when you see something if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) { TotalExp = (1000*hitDiff); TotalExp = (TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4); } else if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (1000*hitDiff); TotalExp = (TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID); } else { TotalExp = (750*hitDiff); TotalExp = (TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); } TotalExp = (750*hitDiff); TotalExp = (TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints); attackTimer = 7; change it to what ever you want.

Read full topic
